title: VA - RockHard Valhalla: Retratos Subterraneos (2007) - Goth
description:
VA - ROCKHARD VALHALLA (presents) Retratos Subterraneos (2007)

Country: Brazil
Format: 192 kbps cbr
Release: 2007
Type: Gothic Rock, Post-Punk, EBM, Industrial, Synthpop, Darkwave.

*free from website www.valhalla.com.br -or- www.rockhard.com.br

Keeping the same unquiet spirit that released the collections Valhalla Demo Section Volumes 1 and 2 only with independent bands, the magazine Rock Hard - Valhalla now presents a virtual collection called Retratos Subterraneos. This collection resumes in 18 tracks the gothic scenery nowadays in Brazil.

The Retratos Subterraneos collection was based on material published on the column Sex, Drugs & Drum Machines by Rodrigo Helfenstein - responsible also for this collection project.

The Rock Hard-Valhalla Magazine, the only magazine to dedicate a column specially for the traditional gothic public, mentioning ignores styles - and even unknown - by some other music specialized magazines, like gothic rock, post-punk, EBM, industrial, synthpop, darkwave and others involved under the label "dark". 

This collections has the purpose to promote and integrate the national "dark" scenery without thinking on financial feedback. That is the reason this collection is for free.
